title: Ep: 027 - Chief Marketing Officer - Pascal Molenat
description:
In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography we sit down our good friend Pascal Molenat, Principal & Chief Marketing Officer at OTJ Architects.  We take a look behind the curtain of a large architecture firm and how they make informed decisions about photographing spaces and choosing the right photographers to work with.  Throughout the interview we ask questions from our Instagram audience.  How is video impacting your marketing efforts?  How should new photographers reach out to an architecture firm?

Our conversation is wide ranging and aimed squarely at architecture photographers interested in growing their skill set and further refining their marketing efforts.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
